feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.31.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Disable creation of createdAt and createdBy auto columns when default values is enabled. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14486
  • Add LICENSE_TYPE by @calexiou in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14499
  • Budi 8607 Fixes App-Preview z-index by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14500
  • Types for new view calculation feature. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14501
  • Row action view security by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14476
  • Refactor automation orchestrator to support branching by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14461

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.31.4...2.31.5

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.31.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enrich on squashing by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14439
  • Feature flagging pick relationship fields by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14459
  • Picker only for views by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14473
  • Display relationship fields by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14482
  • Support updating names by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14503
  • Pick relationship fields by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14457
  • Run row action as sync by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14507
  • Don't add PR message on XL PRs by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14512

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.31.5...2.31.6

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.31.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add API validation and some tests for automation branching by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14508
  • fix issue with multiple loops breaking automation context by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14514
  • add MariaDB to README.md by @robertsilen in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14513
  • Drag and drop improvements by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14523
  • Fix issue with enriching screen definitions causing bad component instances to be parsed by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14529
  • Fix: unable to upgrade plan by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14527

New Contributors

  • @robertsilen made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14513

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.31.6...2.31.7

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.31.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Row action view security by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14511
  • Add old roles by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14538

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.31.7...2.31.8

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Test against SQL Server 2017, get JSON aggregation of relationships working under 2017. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14515
  • Apply new relationship retrieval to all SQL DBs by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14509
  • Feature flag the branch action definition by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14522
  • Fix relationship popover click behaviour by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14539
  • Fix long popover for relationship column pickers by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14540
  • Fix to accommodate filtering updates for GoogleSheets by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14542
  • Enrich views by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14541
  • [BUDI-8579] Create more realistic tests for Google Sheets by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14535
  • More google sheets tests by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14548
  • SQL - utilise JSON aggregations for relationships by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14532
  • Part 1 of 2: Platform level AI Configuration by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14543

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.31.8...2.32.0
